# YELLOW
# walk
3001	30001	100	30002	100
# die
3002	30003	100
# die and fly
3003	30004	50	30005	50
# walk with wings
3004	30006	100	30007	100
# jump low
3005	30006	50	30007	50
# jump high
3006	30006	30	30008	30	30007	30	30009	30

# RED
# walk
3011	30011	100	30012	100
# die
3012	30013	100
# die and fly
3013	30014	50	30015	50
# walk with wings
3014	30016	100	30017	100
# jump low
3015	30016	50	30017	50
# jump high
3016	30016	30	30018	30	30017	30	30019	30
